Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text from autopsy;
  • Libertini, Wessel: Ï†Î»ÎµÎ²Î±ÏÎ¯Ï‰(Î½)

English translation

Jonathan Prag

Paskasia, a maiden, of 15 years passed away 8 days before the kalends of February, following the consulship of Vincentius [25 January 402 CE]. Good fortune, daughter!

commentary

For the form Î¦Î»ÎµÎ²Î±ÏÎ¯Ï‰Î½, compare ISic003565 (Modica)
